revised_title: Practical Use of Aneroid Barometer as an Orometer and its Improvements
tldr: The author discusses the practical use of aneroid barometers as altimeters and their improvements. They explain how to compensate for temperature variations and provide examples of their use in Ceylon and British railways. The author also suggests improvements to the aneroid's graduation process and offers tables and diagrams to illustrate the effects of diurnal and local variations.
